tool_description: PresentID Face Similarity API can detect a face in your image and shows the most similar image.
name: Face Similarity
title: Face Similarity

api_list.name: Send image with image file
api_list.description:
Face Similarity API can detect a face in your image and shows the most similar image.

*Image size should not exceed 8 MB*
*Also, the images should not be larger than 5000 pixels and smaller than 50 pixels*

api_list.name: Send image with image URL
api_list.description:
Face Similarity API can detect a face in your image and shows the most similar image.

*Image size should not exceed 8 MB*
*Also, the images should not be larger than 5000 pixels and smaller than 50 pixels*

api_list.name: Send image with Base64
api_list.description:
Face Similarity API can detect a face in your image and shows the most similar image.

*Image size should not exceed 8 MB*
*Also, the images should not be larger than 5000 pixels and smaller than 50 pixels*
